analysisMethod: Direct on-chain inspection - addresses are plaintext visible
findings: 37 transfers have BOTH sender AND recipient addresses visible on-chain
Bulletproofs successfully hide amounts but provide zero address privacy
53.7% of transfers have partial or full address exposure
vulnerabilities: CRITICAL: Sender and recipient addresses visible in 46.3% of transfers
CRITICAL: Bulletproofs only hide amounts - transaction graph exposed
HIGH: Address clustering trivial with visible addresses
recommendations: ShadowWire should NOT be used when address privacy is required
Bulletproofs alone are insufficient - need stealth addresses
Consider SilentSwap or Privacy Cash for address privacy
